java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
OffHeapStructAccessor
public class OffHeapStructIndexAccessor
extends Object
implements OffHeapStructAccessor

Struct's accessor implementation for off-heap stored structs

Author:
alexkasko Date: 9/13/13
